channel.title: mailcow: dockerized - Blog
channel.description: The mailserver suite with the 'moo' – 🐮 + 🐋 = 💕 | Official Blog Page

item.title: ⚠️ 2022-10a | Critical stability update ⚠️
item.author: Niklas Meyer
item.description:
Moohoo everyone!

Yesterday (on 25th October 2022) we´ve released the 2022-10 update. This Update here contains a critical error with the spam filtering for several (not many), which ensures that no more emails can go out or come in.

We strongly advise you to update your mailcow installation which is updated with the 2022-10 update!!
